pages.title: Zweiender
pages.text: $(li)The Zweiender is the result of the combination of the $(br)$(l:patchouli:weapons/final_fractal)Final Fractal$(/l) and the hardest material in this world known as the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/cataclysm/enderite_ingot)Enderite Ingot$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will deal double damage to any creature you hit with it on its back.
